description:
Unit 8 is given the latest technology: the Seiran.  The 8th is now far stronger, and is also given a new pilot.  Namie Portman: a fellow student of Tokimune`s and a new test pilot.  She is talented by nervous and overreliant on her manuals.  The 8th is given an order to attack.  Having someone under his command changes Tokimune...
Source: crunchyroll
